metadata.title: Lazyman's Tek - STB Extraction Guide
metadata.significance: First MHRB tek for broken/whole bark without powdering

overview.simplicity: Much simpler than earlier A-B teks requiring acid and pH meters
overview.key_innovation: Extract whole broken pieces of root bark without powdering
basic_process: Submerge broken bark pieces in NaOH-basified water
Wait an hour for bark to soften
advantages: Less time and work than A-B teks
Higher yields than many other methods

step_1_preparation.action: Break bark into small pieces (no piece longer than 3 inches)
step_1_preparation.container: Large 5L mixing bowl with extra room

step_2_basify.action: Dissolve 200g NaOH (~13 tablespoons) into 2L tap water

step_3_soak.action: Add basified water to bark, stir, set aside 2+ hours

step_4_mash.action: Mash softened bark with potato masher 20-30 minutes
step_4_mash.note: Bark will still be fairly hard if only soaking 2 hours

step_6_separate.action: Pour clear naphtha from top, leaving dark soup behind
step_6_separate.caution: Do not allow dark water or emulsion bubbles into collection

step_7_evaporate.action: Pour naphtha into flat glass pan, evaporate with fan
step_7_evaporate.result: White DMT bumps stuck to glass

step_8_collect.action: Scrape with flat blade after completely solidified
step_8_collect.note: Wait for shiny clear film to solidify white before scraping

fifth_extraction.temperature: Warmed to 120째F, stirred 20 minutes before pull

sixth_extraction.problem: Did not firm up quickly - soft sticky for 8 hours
sixth_extraction.cause: Likely fatty impurities released from excessive heat

temperature_guidelines.recommendation: Soak at room temp for 72+ hours, only warm to 120째F briefly before pull

dry_defat_method.necessity: Not normally needed for MHRB (very low fat content)
dry_defat_method.principle: Alkaloid already in salt form in dried bark, naphtha won't extract without basification
process: Mix dry powder into naphtha (no water)
Save strained naphtha - fine particles settle overnight
dry_defat_method.extreme_defat: Heat naphtha to 100째F+ before stirring with powder
dry_defat_method.fat_content_note: Only orange fats extracted, no alkaloid without basification

separation_tips.emulsion_handling: Wait a few minutes to an hour for emulsion to settle
separation_tips.pouring_technique: Use measuring cup with spout for controlled pouring
separation_tips.clarity: Only collect clear solvent, leave dark water and bubbles behind

process: Single large pull may contain 2/3 of total alkaloid
long_soak_method.follow_up: Still need 3+ re-extractions after initial pull

degradation_warning.report: DMT may break down in high pH solution over time

lazyman_cons: Risk of soap formation if using oils
Not suitable for veggie oil extraction

harm_reduction_notes.legal_status: DMT is a controlled substance in most jurisdictions
harm_reduction_notes.purpose: Historical documentation of harm reduction community research
harm_reduction_notes.NaOH_safety: Sodium hydroxide is highly caustic - use protective equipment
